body.name: ARETI 5ghz WiFi Security Camera Indoor, 4MP Plug-in Pet Dog Camera with Phone App, Baby Home Cam 2.4G/5G Dual-Band, AI Motion Detection, Auto Tracking, 2-Way Talk, Night Vision, Works with Alexa 2PC
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 27 mins
features: 【4MP Resolution & Dual WiFi Bands】Arenti pet camera provides 2.5K 4MP ultra clear live stream which allows you to monitor pets, babies or elderly. This WiFi camera works on both 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands to provide stronger signal and faster WiFi connection.

【AI Human Motion/Sound Detection & Auto Tracking】By artificial intelligence algorithm, the security camera can distinguish between human and other objects and send you real-time motion/sound-triggered notifications. Featured motion sensor, Arenti Dog camera will automatically rotate to capture the activities of your pets/babies.

【Enhanced Infrared Night Vision & Two-way Talk】With high-sensitivity CMOS image sensor, F2.0 large aperture and 8pcs 840nm infrared lights, Arenti home camera displays a sharper image in the night up to 32ft. Built-in microphone and speaker, you are able to talk to your family anywhere anytime through the indoor camera.

【Privacy Mode & Flexible Storage】Privacy Mode enabled, the live streaming and recording will be temporarily disabled. And the live view in the app will turn black to protect privacy. Insert a Micro SD card(up to 128G, not included) to the baby camera monitor and enable 24/7 continuous recording to capture precious moment. Or use cloud storage to store photos and videos. Support NVR and Onvif, bank-level encryption technology and the highest protection of data to ensure the security of privacy.

【Web Browser Access & Multi-Viewing & Sharing】Arenti indoor camera supports web browser access and adding multiple cameras on the app, displaying 4 live videos to keep up with everything in your home. Sharing the camera with your family up to 5 devices simultaneously and enjoy the convenience that this cat camera brings to you.

productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 1,200 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Arenti 2.4G/5GHz WiFi Security Camera Wireless Arenti Camera, Smartify Your Life

4MP Resolution 2.5K 4MP ultra clear live stream which allows you to monitor pets, babies or elderly. 360° Full Coverage The indoor security camera features a 93° wide-angle enhanced lens that combines 355° pan and 60° tilt range to create a full 360° coverage Ultra Clear Night Vision With high-sensitivity CMOS image sensor, F2.0 large aperture and 8pcs 840nm infrared lights, Arenti home camera displays a sharper image in the night up to 32ft.

Motion Detection & Auto Tracking Featured motion sensor, Arenti dog camera will automatically rotate to capture the activities of your pets/babies. AI Human Detection By artificial intelligence algorithm, the security camera can distinguish between humans and other objects. Sound Detection The camera will send you real-time motion/sound-triggered notifications.

More Features, More Security Two-way Audio Built-in microphone and speaker, you are able to talk to your family anywhere anytime through the indoor camera. Customized Area Detection Only send notifications when motions are detected in your customized monitoring area. Multi-viewer Sharing the video with your family up to 5 devices simultaneously and enjoy the convenience that this cat camera brings to you.

Do this support 5G Wi-Fi? Yes, we support 2.4G/5G dual band for connecting. It won't connect to my Wi-Fi. What should I do? 1-Please upgrade the Arenti app to the latest version. otherwise, the app may give an error message. 2-Please follow the steps below: A. Wi-Fi password should not contain the characters like or \, etc; Wi-Fi name and password should not exceed 32 digits. B. Make sure the device indicator light is flashing red slowly (twice a second) and then add the camera according to the app's prompt. C. If the QR code distribution network is unsuccessful, please use other methods to distribute the network. (Click Help on the QR code interface to choose manual connection)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Camera for the Price! Easy Set-Up!!
reviews.reviewText: I took a chance and bought 4 of these at once, and boy, I'm glad I did! They connected in less than 4 minutes each with no issues at all. When you plug the camera in, it literally talks you through what to do (or shows you on the app). Simple and easy. I didn't even crack open the instructions. No need to. I had all 4 up and running in no time, all while eating my dinner at the same time. The video quality is perfect and I love the fact the camera has the option to automatically track/follow the person/thing it "sees." So cool. You can set the camera to ignore pets and only track humans, or even have it track a specially defined area you indicate. This camera has everything I needed and I am very happy that I purchased it. 100%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received the camera a few hours ago, and I haven’t gone over everything that it can do. The setup was simple, no problems. The motion detection works fine and the picture quality is great. So far I’m pleased. I’m so glad that I finally found a camera that works and connect with my Wi-Fi. I have tried 4 cameras ( yes 4), there was always an issue. So, I’m pleased with Arenti P2Q camera. Price was great and app works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Good Camera
reviews.reviewText: I like the video quality (night quality is just ok, day quailty is excellent), and the ability to record events to a uSD card. I like the camera's ability to track the motion across a wide field. The event recording to the uSD card now works pretty well but my first two uSD cards were not reliable and I had to buy a new Samsung to get reliable recordings. I use the camera to look out a window at my front lawn/street.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: I got this to watch my cats … easy set up…excellent picture…works great for what I need. Bought a 2nd one for another room. Can’t beat it for $20!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I set this up to keep an eye on our dogs. It was easy to get connected and picture quality is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited for this product, and for the price I am even more in love with it. Super easy to set up and into use. It does only allow one user for the app to view the camera, but other than that no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for watching my dog
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up and work the app. Now I am addicted to watching my dog while I’m gone. I can even follow her as she moves into the kitchen. I can hear her barking. I don't think my voice is very clear speaking to her but that’s not what I needed this for. Highly recommend. I can’t believe I can watch her all day for such a low cost and easy set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to get online
reviews.reviewText: So far(2 weeks) I'm pretty happy with these cameras. The price was right and they were very easy to hook up. I'm not tech savvy and these hook up to 5ghz wifi without any issues. Many cameras only use 2.4 and that was an issue for me. The pictures and videos are clear. I will say that the camera is slow to pick up motion at times. I do like the 360° swivel. All in all I would highly recommend these cameras.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Our 3rd arenti camera came and unfortunately was defective. Spoken with customer services and they are replacing. Fantastic customer service. Our other two cameras are great, superb night vision, so easy having all cameras linked to the same app for convenience. Highly recommend:)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Was pleasantly surprised at this camera, not expecting much given the price but it's proved me wrong. Brilliant picture, easy to set up and works perfectly. Even comes with screws to secure to the wall if needed. Only downside is Google assistant can't do playback BUY it can stream via Chromecast to a TV so not so bad. Even the app is easy to use. Definitely be buying more of these in the future.

Greatest camera ever, for the price. The design is amazing, it has great range for pan/tilt, and almost 360° View. The setup can't be easier, it took me less than 5 minutes to have the camera on my 5Ghz WiFi and have the application installed on my iPhone.For those of you that are not super technical, look on YouTube and there's nice videos for the initial turn on. Don't be afraid, it's super easy. You can also use the app. There's a walk-thru with voice command to assist you. I tried the app on an iPhone 7+ and 13 Pro.This camera is a real 802.11ac, 5ghz frequency, compatible. I unplugged the camera multiple times and it reconnected to my WiFi network right away.Now let's talk about the application. So far it is FLAWLESS, either on my network and outside my network. I tried on the LTE network. I let my phone run the app for 10 hours in a row on my desk, while working. Not a glitch, no issue at all. It is intuitive and very easy to use. Everything you need is on the main page. The 2-way audio, the pan/tilt, the take-a-picture button and video recording. Yes you can record while watching on your phone.You can watch video while connected on the same network or while you're away. It worked great on LTE network. I tried UHD, HD and SD video quality mode. Personally, the best mode is HD. You can watch the video stream outside your WiFi network and have a constantly running transmission to your phone. There's nothing special to do, just fire up the application and enjoy.You can also watch video from your web browser. Just go on Arenti web site the get the url. I tried Firefox and Chrome, on a macOS, without any issue. Arenti suggest to use Chrome.The night mode is just amazing. It's like during the day except in black and white. I've never seen such a good quality when in the dark. When the camera is in night mode, you will see 4 red lights around it.You don't need an SD card to use the camera, unless you want to record events. I tried a 256Gb without a problem. Be aware that if the SD card is not FAT32, the camera will reformat it. Make sure you take a backup copy if it's a used one.The only drawback is the 2-way audio. From your phone the sound is crisp and clear. No issue at all. On the camera side, the sound is not that great. I suspect that the speaker and mic are to close on the camera, so there's a bit of feedback. That was the only negative aspect. I needed to find one :-)If I could, I would give 10 stars for this 50$ camera. I'm waiting for another deal on Amazon to buy more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Really good camera with night vision and alerts.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this camera as security for my room while I am away.Sure enough over Christmas (I was visiting family) my phone alerted me to movement and I was able to bring up a housemate going into my room (was in the night and the IR works really well).It's not a hidden or spy cam but great if you want to see whats going on while you are not home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have rated this product 5 stars just for the care from the after sales team.. the camera didn’t connect to my wifi and I contacted the after sales team and they arranged for a full refund for me, so therefore I am rating their team 5 stars.
